Settings

Close Save Settings
  • Etsy Shop
  • Import/Export Data
  • Remove Data

Enter your Etsy shop name. This is the shop that all listings will be pulled from using the Etsy Listings API.

Auto Update Listings

When enabled, the selected listings type will be automatically updated every X minutes, where X is an interval you specify.

Update Listings At Start

When enabled, the selected listings type will be automatically updated at every start of the application

Import Data

File
Import

Click the "File" button to select an import file. This must be a file that was created using the below import function. This feature will import all of the product and bin data that was previously backed up.

Export Data

Export

Exporting data allows you to download a backup copy of your currently stored products and the bins they are in. Use this feature regularly to ensure you have copies of your application data in case of hardware failure.

Remove All Products

Removes all products from the applications inventory

Remove All Bins

Removes all bins from the applications inventory

Reset Settings

Resets all application settings to their defaults

Reset Everything

Removes all application data, resetting everything

Confirm Database Delete

Are you sure you want to delete the application database? This will reset ALL of your product and bins data. This is effectively the same as starting over from scratch. This action cannot be undone!
